p: So happy about the possibility of your Camlen Camark Potter work. Only, after reading the letter, I'd want to be surer that they aren't hoping to make money off of you, before you go to see them. Wouldn't it be great to be able to make some money off of them! I know just how you'd feel! Ol & I are holding thumbs with regard to the thing you may be sure!! What does Dad think of the outfit?
I shall mail it to Hil (the Carmen letter) with the request that she send it on to you. I'm going to talk to her this a.m.
Tomorrow, I am expecting the "curse" again. I dread them! The last was so hard a plow. Maybe this won't be so bad!
I'm going to have Al get me a pattern for baby jackets, etc. so I can get going on that wool.
Ol thinks we'll have a girl this time! Nobody knows.
P.S. Let us know all about what comes of the pottery business. -E-&O-
